entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:13 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:13 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 30%
